snippet.title: Encased RPG | Backstory Trailer
snippet.description:
Encased is an old-school sci-fi post-apocalyptic RPG in development.

Buy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/921800
Buy on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/encased_a_scifi_postapocalyptic_rpg 

Join our Discord server:
https://discord.gg/56RFZTV

Early Access Teaser:
https://youtu.be/m294VMMh_Uw 

Early Access Gameplay Trailer: 
https://youtu.be/7NoZ2OrPq3s 

Watch Dev Diaries: 
https://youtu.be/Y59cOsWq--M 

Create your own character and become a part of the game! https://cronus.darkcrystalgames.com/ 

Read C.R.O.N.U.S. Brochure and learn more about backstory: http://darkcrystalgames.com/cdn/CRONUS_Eng.pdf 

Visit our website to learn more:
https://darkcrystalgames.com/ 

Follow us on social media:
https://twitter.com/darkcrystal_hq 
https://www.facebook.com/darkcrystalhq/ 
https://vk.com/darkcrystalgames 
https://instagram.com/darkcrystalgames
